titles.title: The Touch of His Hand on Mine

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There are days so dark that I seek in vain For the face of my Friend Divine; But tho' darkness hide, He is there to guide By the touch of His hand on mine.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Oh, the touch of His hand on mine, Oh, the touch of His hand on mine! There is grace and powâ€™r, in the trying hour, In the touch of His hand on mine.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: There are times, when tired of the toilsome road, That for ways of the world I pine; But He draws me back to the upward track By the touch of His hand on mine.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: When the way is dim, and I cannot see Thro' the mist of His wise design, How my glad heart yearns and my faith returns By the touch of His hand on mine.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: In the last sad hour, as I stand alone Where the powers of death combine, While the dark waves roll He will guide my soul By the touch of His hand on mine.
